hours_text:
# Plan a Visit

In addition to managing the _[Historical Museum](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/museum/)_ , the society also manages and interprets 4 Historic Sites:

  1. _[Plum Grove Historic Home](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/plum-grove/)_
  2. _[Johnson County Historic Poor Farm](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/poor-farm/)_
  3. _[1876 Coralville Schoolhouse](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/schoolhouse/)_
  4. _[Coralville Old Town Hall](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/coralville-town-hall/)._

Each location is open on various hours and days. _(Click the links below to learn more.)_

#### [Johnson County Historical Museum](/museum/)

Located at the Iowa River Landing _(Inside Xtream Arena)_

# 

# 

#### [Plum Grove Historic Home](/plum-grove/)

Home of the first governor of the Territory of Iowa.

#### [Johnson County Historic Poor Farm](/poor-farm/)

A window into nineteenth century care of the poor & mentally ill

#### [1876 Coralville Schoolhouse](/schoolhouse/)

Where one room shaped many lives.

#### [Coralville Old Town Hall](/coralville-town-hall/)

#### 

Now located across from the 1876 Coralville Schoolhouse

admission_text:
# Membership

Johnson County’s history is rich with stories—stories the Johnson County Historical Society is dedicated to preserving. The Society’s enthusiastic staff and dedicated volunteers pride themselves on bringing the dramatic tales of the county’s frontier life, political influence, and breathtaking vistas to life through refreshing programs and exhibits.

_Join or renew your membership of the Johnson County Historical Society to help us continue to_ :

  * PRESERVE over 14,000 artifacts in our collection
  * SUSTAIN the daily operations of the Heritage Museum and historic sites
  * SUPPORT ongoing adult and youth education programs

## Member Benefits

[](https://www.guidestar.org/profile/23-7427638)

[](http://www.communityfoundationofjohnsoncounty.org/)

  * Free Admission to the JCHS Heritage Museum
  * Special rates for programs and events.
  * $25 discount off [Coralville Old Town Hall rentals](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/coralville-town-hall/).
  * [Time Travelers](https://timetravelers.mohistory.org/) benefits at museums nationwide.
  * Our [periodic newsletter](http://eepurl.com/hxVd41) with updates about upcoming programs, events, exhibits, and much more.
  * Up to five black and white photocopies for free (8 ½” x 11” or 8 ½” x 14”) and 10% discount on additional digital reproductions and licensing.
  * Special: Join at the $250/year rate and get a **FREE** copy of our book, [All in One Room](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/books-for-purchase/)!

collections_text:
#### Johnson County Historical Society is committed to serving the public by furthering an appreciation of the historical and cultural heritage of the Johnson County community through education, preservation and interpretation.

##### In addition to managing the Historical Museum, the society also manages and interprets four historic sites: Plum Grove Historic Home, the Johnson County Historic Poor Farm, the 1876 Coralville Schoolhouse, and the Coralville Old Town Hall.

##### _**[CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFO!!](https://johnsoncountyhistory.org/sites/)**_

### _The Heritage Museum_

[Xtream Arena](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=454f4b93762381d7&sxsrf=AE3TifMz1EYO2tgEDSAH4KuBACf3eloc_g:1751844544245&q=Xtream+Arena&ludocid=12598847865191068758&lsig=AB86z5U5YnhpfKUdLXduNGzoGyQ1&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiMtYu-samOAxWQ6ckDHYKrMyoQ8G0oAHoECEwQAQ)

200 E. 9th St. Suite 101  
Coralville, IA 52241  
(319) 569-4502

##### **Hours**

  * **Monday** : Closed
  * **Tuesday – Saturday** : 10am – 5pm
  * **Sunday** : 12pm – 5pm
  * **Adults** : $10
  * **Children** _(7-12 yrs. old)_ : $5
  * **Children** _(6 yrs. & younger)_: FREE!
  * **JCHS Members** : FREE! 
    * _Includes access to the Antique Car Museum of Iowa_
  * Group Rates available with advanced notice!
